item.description: This week on 5 June marks 21 years since I started Phoronix.com for providing Linux hardware reviews and open-source news. In marking the 21st birthday of Phoronix is a special Phoronix Premium offering if you wish to show your support and hopefully provide for a successful year...

item.title: Russian Investigators ‘Seized $8.2M Worth of Crypto from Hydra Darknet Server Chief’
item.description:
Russian investigators confiscated crypto worth around 649 million rubles ($8.2 million) from the wallets of Dmitry Pavlov, the 35-year-old self-confessed server mastermind behind the Hydra darknet portal.

The post Russian Investigators ‘Seized $8.2M Worth of Crypto from Hydra Darknet Server Chief’ appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Reitar Logtech Holdings Bets $1.5B on 15,000 BTC to Drive Global Expansion
item.description:
HK-based Reitar Logtech Holdings has set aside up to $1.5 billion to secure 15,000 BTC via share swaps with institutional and high-net-worth investors, a move it says will boost financial resilience, support Asian expansion, and accelerate blockchain integration across its supply-chain network.

The post Reitar Logtech Holdings Bets $1.5B on 15,000 BTC to Drive Global Expansion appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Norwegian Block Exchange Becomes Norway’s First Public Bitcoin Treasury Firm
item.description:
Norwegian Block Exchange has become Norway’s first listed company to hold Bitcoin, adding 6 BTC and targeting 10 by month-end. The exchange plans Bitcoin-backed loans, MiCA-compliant Cardano stablecoin yield, and fresh capital raises to expand its treasury.

The post Norwegian Block Exchange Becomes Norway’s First Public Bitcoin Treasury Firm appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Is SKOR AI For Real? Hours Left to Buy Trusted MIND of Pepe Token Before Price Explodes at Listing on 3 June
item.description:
MIND of Pepe has raised $12.2m and is set to list on Uniswap at $0.0037515, with dynamic staking at 199% annualised. Its audited smart contract and live AI agent come as SKOR AI, lacking audit clarity, has gained 32% in a week.

The post Is SKOR AI For Real? Hours Left to Buy Trusted MIND of Pepe Token Before Price Explodes at Listing on 3 June  appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: ChatGPT Predicts the Price of Cardano, Ethereum, and Solana by End of 2025
item.description:
ChatGPT predicts potential doublings for Cardano, Solana and Ethereum by New Year, and flags SUBBD’s presale momentum. The AI has cited technical breakouts, political tailwinds and Bitcoin’s $111,814 record on May 22 as factors already lifting crypto sentiment.

The post ChatGPT Predicts the Price of Cardano, Ethereum, and Solana by End of 2025 appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Whale Signal or Exit? XRP Price Prediction After 44M Tokens Leave Exchange
item.description:
The XRP price has slipped by 8.2% to $2.14 amid a broader market cooldown following last month’s rally.Yet fresh signs of accumulation are emerging, with one XRP community member on X reporting a major exchange withdrawal just days ago.It appears that the Turkish crypto exchange Paribu has taken out of circulation 44.1 million XRP tokens […]

item.title: Poland Elects Pro-Crypto President Nawrocki – Will He Follow Trump’s Lead with a Bitcoin Treasury?
item.description:
Karol Nawrocki has clinched Poland's presidency with 50.89 % of ballots, melding conservative politics with a pro-growth stance on digital assets. His win has revived debate on deregulation, startup incentives, and whether Poland might add Bitcoin to state reserves despite central bank caution.

The post Poland Elects Pro-Crypto President Nawrocki – Will He Follow Trump’s Lead with a Bitcoin Treasury? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Crypto Price Prediction Today 2 June – XRP, Flare, Hyperliquid
item.description:
Crypto price prediction has detailed rising confidence in digital assets after Bitcoin’s $111,814 peak, noting forecasts that XRP, Flare, Hyperliquid’s HYPE and presale token SUBBD could each realise 10x upside if the anticipated bull run extends into 2025.

The post Crypto Price Prediction Today 2 June – XRP, Flare, Hyperliquid appeared first on Cryptonews.
